'''Mythcon 13''' was the thirteenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Celtic Con": The Celtic Influence on Fantasy Literature
*'''Special Guests:''' Nancy-Lou Patterson (keynote speaker), [[Marion Zimmer Bradley]] (fantasy author), [[Tim Kirk]] (artist), Katherine Kurtz (fantasy author), Kathryn Lindskoog (Lewis scholar), Ataniel Noel (Tolkien scholar), Paul Edwin Zimmer (fantasy author), [[Bernie Zuber]] (founder Tolkien Fellowship)
*'''Chairman:''' Lisa Cowan
